short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import your ESPN Leagues to FantasyGuru

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects your FantasyGuru MyGURU account with your ESPN Private Fantasy Football Leagues. If you have a private ESPN fantasy football league, then this is a must have in order to import your league properly!
